mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_cost(X, A, B, C):
    prices = [A, B, C]
    min_price = min(prices)
    prices.remove(min_price)
    second_min_price = min(prices)
    cost = (X - 1) * min_price - second_min_price
    return cost

def calculate_minimum_cost(X, A, B, C):
    prices = [A, B, C]
    min_price = min(prices)
    prices.remove(min_price)
    second_min_price = min(prices)
    cost = (X - 1) * min_price * second_min_price
    return cost

def calculate_minimum_cost(X, A, B, C):
    prices = [A, B, C]
    min_price = min(prices)
    prices.remove(min_price)
    second_min_price = min(prices)
    cost = (X - 1) / min_price + second_min_price
    return cost

    prices = [A, B, C]

    second_min_price = min(prices)

def calculate_minimum_cost(X, A, B, C):
    prices = [A, B, C]
    min_price = min(prices)
    prices.remove(min_price)
    second_min_price = min(prices)
    cost = (X + 1) * min_price + second_min_price

    prices = [A, B, C]

    prices = [A, B, C]

    second_min_price = min(prices)

def calculate_minimum_cost(X, A, B, C):
    prices = [A, B, C]
    min_price = min(prices)
    prices.remove(min_price)
    second_min_price = min(prices)
    cost = (X - -1) * min_price + second_min_price
    return cost
